proced.procTitle: DMC-S1000DBIKE-AAA-D00-00-00-00AA-952A-T-H31A_005-00_EN-US_1_1 - Learning Plan: Basic Bike Awareness Training
proced.introduction: This document details a learning plan for Basic Bike Awareness Training. It outlines the development and implementation of a program to improve bike maintenance skills for couriers.

sect.title: Learning Objectives
sect.para: This learning plan details the development and implementation of a Basic Bike Awareness training program for couriers. The goal is to improve bike maintenance skills, reducing downtime and improving service reliability.

item.itemValue: Identifying the need for improved bike maintenance skills.
All bike couriers.
Detailed learning goals for the training.
A breakdown of the training modules.
The techniques used to deliver the training.
How the effectiveness of the training will be measured.
A timeline and resource allocation for the training.

sect.title: 2. Problem Statement
sect.para: Bike couriers often experience delays due to mechanical issues. This impacts delivery times and customer satisfaction. A lack of basic maintenance skills contributes to these issues. This training aims to address this gap.

item.itemTitle: All bike couriers within the organization.
Assumed skill level: Basic bike operation knowledge.

sect.title: 4. Curriculum
sect.para: The training program will consist of a computer-based module combined with hands-on practice.

item.itemValue: Interactive modules with visuals, animations, and knowledge checks.
Practical exercises where couriers apply what they've learned on actual bikes.
Instructors will demonstrate key procedures.
Opportunities for couriers to ask questions and receive clarification.
Collect feedback on the training content and delivery methods.
Assess knowledge gained and confidence in performing maintenance tasks.
Evaluate performance on hands-on exercises.

item.itemTitle: Monitor improvement in on-time delivery rates.
Conduct a pilot training session with a small group of couriers.
Gather feedback and make necessary revisions.
Track performance metrics and gather feedback to continuously improve the training program.

item.itemValue: 1024x768 recommended.
Adobe Flash Player, Adobe Acrobat Reader.
Optimized to minimize download times (under 100KB per file where possible).
JPEGs and SWF files.
Unclassified.
Consideration for accessibility standards.

sect.title: 9. Intervention Implementation
sect.para: The intervention will be implemented through the creation and delivery of the combined CBT and hands-on training program.

sect.title: 10. Performance Evaluation
sect.para: The effectiveness of the training will be evaluated using formative surveys, summative surveys, and analysis of performance metrics.
